mapper.select: select r.review_num,r.review_regdate,r.review_content, m.mb_name,p.pro_num from class_review r join member_info m on r.ml_num = m.ml_num join profile_img p on m.pro_num = p.pro_num where class_num=#{class_num} and review_status=0 order by review_num desc limit #{startRow},4
select ifnull(count(*),0) from class_review where class_num=#{class_num} and review_status=0
select IFNULL(round(sum(curr_rating +ready_rating+kind_rating+time_rating)/4,1),0) class_rating from class_review where class_num=aa.class_num
select IFNULL(count(*),0) from class_review where class_num=#{class_num} and ml_num=#{ml_num}

select ci.class_num,ci.tutor_nickname,ci.pro_num, truncate(sum(a.curr_avg+a.ready_avg+a.kind_avg+a.time_avg)/4,1) tot_avg,cnt from( select class_num,count(review_num) cnt,round(avg(curr_rating),1) curr_avg, round(avg(ready_rating),1) ready_avg, round(avg(kind_rating),1) kind_avg, round(avg(time_rating),1) time_avg from class_review group by class_num )a join class_info ci on ci.class_num=a.class_num where ci.class_status=0 group by ci.class_num order by tot_avg desc, cnt desc
